dcterms:description: A publicly available collection of approximately three million scanned issues of newspapers and journals ranging from years 1771 to 1910, which have been OCR read but contain many errors due to factors like old age and difficult fonts.
dcterms:title: National Library of Finland’s (NLF) collection of newspapers and journals

dcterms:description: A collection of literary works available in digital format, which includes a variety of texts but is distinct in style and vocabulary from newspapers.
dcterms:title: Gutenberg project

dcterms:description: A corpus provided by the Institute for the Languages of Finland (Kotus) that covers a large variety of Finnish texts from years 1809 to 1899, focusing on Finnish newspapers.
dcterms:title: Early modern Finnish corpus provided by the Institute for the Languages of Finland (Kotus)

dcterms:description: A corpus of Finnish newspapers that has been manually corrected, primarily from the 19th century, used for evaluating OCR correction models.
dcterms:title: Manually corrected corpus of Finnish newspapers
